    Prompt template
    Use %s to insert parameters into the prompt. 
    Tell me a story based on this text: %s

    Prompt Arguments:

    Input Parameters

    Input parameters are used to pass data into the flow. They can be injected into the prompt template, and used in triggers.

    Test Flow A

    Triggered by:
    • input message
    • equals
